price: 55. Waarlijk, de bewoners van het paradijs zullen op die Dag bezig zijn met prettige dingen.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
